alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 5:28AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Cottonwood and Murray Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Lincoln and Minnehaha Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Lyon, Lincoln and Sioux Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Lincoln and Sioux Counties. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. Redwood River at Russell affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Huron. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, 3rd Street, Highway 14 Business Loop Bypass, in Huron will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM CDT Thursday was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.9 feet tomorrow evening. It may then fall for a period this weekend before rising again next week. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun James River Huron 11.0 11.9 Thu 5 am 15.3 15.8 14.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
